entry.title: AuxXxilium/arc
entry.summary:
Arc is a customized Redpill Loader for DSM 7.x (Xpenology) with enhanced Hardwaresupport, Addons and semi-automated Installation (automated SataPortMap and Diskconfig). User interaction is required and more customization options are builtin.

ARC Redpill Loader for DSM 7.x

Bugreport

  • Before you report an issue or bug please read the Wiki and make sure your setting are correct.
  • If you have to report an issue or bug:
    • Hardware you use (Networkchip, Sata/HBA/Raid Controller)
    • Screenshot the Systeminfo (Arc - Sysinfo) !!! <- IMPORTANT

Links

  • Overview
  • Wiki and Informations
  • Download

Thanks

All code was based on the work of TTG, pocopico, jumkey, fbelavenuto and others involved in continuing TTG's original redpill-load project.
